name: IRREGULAR - One Page Edition
description:
IRREGULAR is a simple TTRPG where the players create sentient robotic machine humanoids called PERSONALITY CONSTRUCTS (or 'PCs'). Created by MAN, PERSONALITY CONSTRUCTS contain the capacity for human emotion, thought, and reasoning, as well as great POWERS that can surpass that of a NORMAL MAN. Outside of your immediate squadron, you are also free to interact with any of the other Networked Personality Constructs (or 'NPCs') who collectively make up the breadth of society.

However, for reasons still unexplained, after a period of time, PCs and NPCs begin to break down, and in the process, go into a berserk state called IRREGULAR. Should a PC or NPC go IRREGULAR, a team of IRREGULAR HUNTERS is dispatched, to incapacitate or--if necessary--kill the IRREGULAR.

That's where you come in. You're an IRREGULAR HUNTER, one of the chosen, to be sure. You come in to a dangerous situation involving an IRREGULAR, and must stop or kill the IRREGULAR threat. But take care--fighting IRREGULARS is a dangerous business. It takes a toll, not just on your body, but on your emotions. 

TAKE CARE WHEN FIGHTING IRREGULARS, LEST YE BECOME IRREGULAR YOURSELF

A larger version of IRREGULAR is still in development; purchases go toward funding a larger expansion!
